snippet: For Pankaj Mishra's profile of the cricketer-turned-politician, we sent Scottish photographer Finlay MacKay to Pakistan who managed to find himself in the thick of a political rally.
abstract: For Pankaj Mishra's profile of the cricketer-turned-politician, we sent Scottish photographer Finlay MacKay to Pakistan who managed to find himself in the thick of a political rally.

headline.main: Getting Close and Personal With Imran Khan
